name: Space Weather Vortexes!
description:
Welcome to Space Weather Vortexes!

Place vortexes to see and listen to how they interact with particles!

Controls (click on the gray area around the game window if the game isn't responding to keyboard presses):

  • Click the mouse to place a vortex, move mouse around to listen to particles and vortexes.
  • Use keyboard buttons 1-5 to control strength of vortex before placing.
  • Use left and right arrow keys to control direction of vortex spin before placing.
  • Use buttons WASD to pan around.
  • Use up and down arrow keys to zoom.
  • Use R to reset.
  • Use O and P to decrease and increase volume, respectively.
